headline: Micron Technology (MU) Tumbles 5%. Here’s Why
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the stocks that bleed heavily. Micron Technology declined by 4.75 percent on Monday to close at $118.61 apiece as investors unloaded positions amid the lack of fresh catalysts to boost investing appetite. On July 22, shareholders of Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) as of July 7 record will expect to receive […]

headline: Stocks to Watch Tuesday: Nvidia, JPMorgan Chase, Wells Fargo
summary: ↗️ Nvidia (NVDA): The $4 trillion company said it had received assurances from the Trump administration it can sell its H20 artificial-intelligence chips in China. Shares rallied in premarket trade, as did other chip stocks, including Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), Broadcom (AVGO) and Micron Technology (MU).
